MICRO
m00 00000 000 000 111 000 011 0000 0001 00 0111010111 c//Bootstrap
m01 00000 000 000 000 000 001 0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//Bootstrap
m02 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//LDA $K,X PC+1->PC,MAR
m03 00000 000 000 101 000 001 0010 0000 00 1011011101 c//MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m04 00000 000 000 111 000 011 0000 0000 00 1110011101 c//MDR+0->ACC
m05 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m06 00000 000 000 000 000 001 0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)
m07 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//LDX #K PC+1->PC,MAR
m08 00000 000 000 111 000 011 0000 0010 00 1110011101 c//MDR+0->X
m09 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//PC+1->RC,MAR
m0a 00000 000 000 000 000 001 0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)
m0b 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0010 0010 01 1111011110 c//INX X+1->X
m0c 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m0d 00000 000 000 000 000 001 0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)
m0e 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//CMPX #Y PC+1->PC,MAR
m0f 00000 000 000 101 001 001 0010 0000 00 1010111101 c//X-Y->NOP,MSTATUSCLK
m10 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//PC+1->RC,MAR
m11 00000 000 000 000 000 001 0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)
m12 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//STA $K,X PC+1->PC,MAR
m13 00000 000 000 101 000 001 0010 0000 00 1011011101 c//MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m14 00000 000 000 100 000 001 0000 0000 00 1000011111 c//ACC+0->NOP,MWE~
m15 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m16 00000 000 000 000 000 001 0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)
m17 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//ADC $K,X PC+1->PC,MAR
m18 00000 000 000 101 000 001 0010 0000 00 0011011101 c//MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m19 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0000 0000 00 0110111001 c//MDR+ACC->ACC,MSTATUSCLK+CARRYE~
m1a 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m1b 00000 000 000 001 000 001 0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)
m1c 00000 000 000 111 000 001 0000 0000 01 0110111110 c//CRC 0+1->NOP,MSTATUSCLK
m1d 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m1e 00000 000 000 001 000 001 0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)
m1f 00011 011 011 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//BRNZ $K PC+1->PC,MAR && if Z=1,JMP+3
m20 00000 000 000 111 000 011 0000 0001 00 1111011101 c//K+0->PC
m21 00000 000 000 001 000 001 0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)
m22 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m23 00000 000 000 001 000 001 0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//NEXT(PC)
m24 00000 000 000 100 000 111 0000 0000 00 0110011111 c//SHLA ACC*2->ACC 
m25 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 01 1111011110 c//PC+1->PC,MAR
m26 00000 000 000 001 000 001 0000 0000 00 0110001111 c//Next(PC)
m27 00000 000 000 101 000 011 0001 0001 00 1111011110 c//HALT PC+0->PC 
m28 00000 000 000 001 000 001 0000 0000 00 0010000000 c//Next(PC)

MAPPER 
m00 02 c//LDA $K,X 
m01 07 c//LDX #K 
m02 0b c//INX
m03 0e c//CMPX #Y
m04 12 c//STA $K,X
m05 17 c//ADC $K,X
m06 1c c//CRC
m07 1f c//BRNZ $K
m08 24 c//SHLA 
m09 27 c//HALT

MAIN
m00 01 	c//opcode LDX #K
m01 00 	c//entelo LDX #K
m02 06 	c//opcode CRC
m03 00 	c//opcode LDA $K,X
m04 13 	c//entelo LDA $K,X
m05 08  c//opcode SHLA
m06 05 	c//opcode ADC $K,X
m07 1c 	c//entelo ADC $K,X	
m08 04 	c//opcode STA $K,X
m09 25	c//entelo STA $K,X
m0a 02 	c//opcode INX
m0b 03 	c//opcode CMPX #Y
m0c 08 	c//entelo CMPX #Y	
m0d 07 	c//opcode BRNZ $K
m0e 03 	c//entelo BRNZ $K	
m0f 09 	c//opcode HALT	
m10 00 	
m11 00 	
m12 FF 	c//Perioxi Dedomenon
m13 01 	c//Z[0]
m14 01 	c//Z[1]
m15 01 	c//Z[2]
m16 01  c//Z[3]
m17 01 	c//Z[4]
m18 01 	c//Z[5]
m19 01  c//Z[6]
m1a 01	c//Z[7]
m1b FF 	c//Perioxi Dedomenon
m1c 01 	c//Y[0]
m1d 01  c//Y[1]
m1e 01 	c//Y[2]
m1f 01 	c//Y[3]
m20 01 	c//Y[4]
m21 01 	c//Y[5]
m22 01 	c//Y[6]
m23 01	c//Y[7]
m24 FF  c//Perioxi Apotelesmaton
m25 00	c//W[0]
m26 00	c//W[1]
m27 00	c//W[2]
m28 00	c//W[3]
m29 00	c//W[4]
m2a 00	c//W[5]
m2b 00	c//W[6]
m2c 00	c//W[7]
